subject: Re: New Button and Page for CFK

Great, thanks!

One last thing - do you have the hosting login details for Care for Kindies?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Joe,

Yes, we can only see kenneth@cbo.me login from CBO and the rest are for WP Perk Support.
Just chasing this up - please let me know if you can assist with login details. I have Kenneth@cbo.me to log in with and am just wondering if there are any other login accounts.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @heath done updating the careers page, can we send the login credentials?
Are you also able to send me all the log in details (emails and passwords) for the CFK wordpress site? Is that something you'd have access to?
awesome @heath will update it now
@rica I have attached the image for you. Thanks,
Champion thank you

Hi Joe, 

Thanks for clarifying. They must have been reduced when being sent as an attachment for some reason. They were only 640 x 453px. Very odd. 

All good though, the https://cbo.d.pr/ERjH4G & https://cbo.d.pr/Mrvlc5 files are showing in full res. 

We will update you shortly.
@heath the images for rev slider is 2000 by 550, I'll ask @jaime if we can resize the image.

How can the images be too small? They are 1607 × 1137 px on my side, surely this is big enough?

Could you please try again if I send them through again?

Please see attached, alternatively they can also be found here: https://cbo.d.pr/ERjH4G & https://cbo.d.pr/Mrvlc5.

Thank you.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Joe, 

We have created the careers page for you here: 
https://www.careforkindies.com.au/careers/

Please note, the image that were sent through are too small to use on the page. We have added another from elsewhere on the website. 

If you would like a different image please send it through and we can update it accordingly.
Logged 30 mins to Harvest

@heath done updating the Careers page, just need help with the rev slider image, The image provided by the client is too small for the rev slider background so I just used the available image in the wp media for now. I also added it to the header menu. Kindly check. Thanks!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Yes, please proceed.

Thank you.

Hi Joe, 

We can take care of this for you as well. It will be a 30min task and we can do it this afternoon if you like? 

Please let me know if you would like us to proceed?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Could I please also get a quote for how long it would take to set up a new 'Careers' button in the CFK header and a new 'Careers' landing page using one of the two images (whichever fits best) and text attached.

Thanks,
